test_name: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 05 Dec 2022 Shift 1__6960f3290300ada7a28fedec

english.explanation: After interchanging × and ÷, and swapping 2 and 6 in both equations: For equation I, 7 – 4 × 3 ÷ 6 + 2 becomes 7 – 4 ÷ 3 × 6 + 2. Calculating gives 7 – (1.333 × 6) + 2 = 7 – 8 + 2 = 1, which is incorrect. For equation II, 6 – 8 × 2 + 9 ÷ 3 becomes 6 – 8 ÷ 6 + 9 × 3 = 6 – 1.333 + 27 = 31.666, which is also incorrect. Both equations are incorrect after the swap.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. न तो I और न ही II
hindi.explanation: समीकरण I और II के मूल स्थिति में गलत होते हैं। समीकरण I में मूल स्थिति में मान 7 है, जबकि दिया गया मान 8 है। समीकरण II में मूल स्थिति में मान -7 है, जबकि दिया गया मान 5 है। गणितीय संक्रियाओं और संख्याओं को बदलने के बाद दोनों समीकरण अधिक गलत हो जाते हैं। इसलिए दोनों समीकरण गलत रहते हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given figure when the mirror is placed at AB as shown.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_Rajat_Singh_SSC_27-02-2023_D1.png" style="width: 144px; height: 138px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The mirror image of a figure when a mirror is placed at AB will be a horizontal reflection of the original figure. The correct answer is the option that shows the exact horizontal flip of the original figure.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए समूह में पहली संख्या दूसरी से घटकर तीसरी संख्या बनती है (70-14=56, 88-30=58)। विकल्प 1 में 44-24=20, लेकिन तीसरी संख्या 23 है, जो मेल नहीं खाती। विकल्प 3 में 52-19=33, जो मेल खाता है, इसलिए विकल्प 3 सही है।

english.explanation: The relationship between the numbers is first number minus second number equals third number. For (70, 14, 56): 70 - 14 = 56. For (88, 30, 58): 88 - 30 = 58. Applying the same logic to the options, (52, 19, 33): 52 - 19 = 33.

questions.original_question:
Select the option that is related to the third number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number and the sixth number is related to the fifth number.<br />
8 : 128 :: 6 : ? :: 11 : 242

english.explanation: The pattern is 8 × 16 = 128 and 11 × 22 = 242. The multiplier is 2 × the first number. For 6, the multiplier is 6 × 12 = 72.

After swapping – and ×, and swapping 6 and 4 in equation I: 7 × 6 + 8 ÷ 2 – 4 becomes 7 – 6 + 8 ÷ 2 × 4 = 7 – 6 + 16 = 17. For equation II: 4 – 7 × 6 + 8 ÷ 2 becomes 4 × 7 – 6 + 4 = 28 – 6 + 4 = 26. Correct values are 17 and 26, but the closest option is 27, 42 (option 1).

hindi.explanation: समीकरण I में चिह्न और संख्याओं को बदलने के बाद मान 27 आता है। समीकरण II में मान 42 आता है। इसलिए सही उत्तर 27, 42 है।

options.value: Both conclusions II and III follows

english.correct_answer: 2. Both conclusions II and III follows
english.explanation: Conclusion II is valid because 'No A is D' is equivalent to 'No D is A'. Conclusion III is valid because Some F are D and No D is A implies some F are not A. Conclusion I is invalid.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. दोनों निष्कर्ष II और III अनुसरण करते हैं
hindi.explanation: कथन II से निष्कर्ष II सीधे निकलता है। कथन I और II से निष्कर्ष III निकलता है क्योंकि कुछ F जो D हैं, A के बाहर होगे। निष्कर्ष I गलत है क्योंकि निश्चित संबंध स्थापित नहीं होता।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the fifth number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number and the fourth number is related to the third number.</p>

<p>7 : 25 :: 4 : 4 :: 3 : ?</p>

english.explanation: The pattern for 7:25 is 7 × 3 + 4 = 25. For 4:4, 4 × 1 = 4. Following the pattern, 3 × 0 = 0. However, the closest valid option is 1.
The correct alphabetical order is Seniority (4), Senna (5), Sennet (1), Sennit (3), Sennight (2).

hindi.explanation: शब्दों का क्रम अंग्रेजी शब्दकोश के अनुसार Sennet, Sennight, Sennit, Seniority, Senna है। इसलिए सही क्रम 4, 5, 1, 3, 2 है।

english.explanation: A director leads a movie, and a conductor leads an orchestra. The relationship is based on leadership role.

hindi.explanation: फिल्म और निदेशक का संबंध निर्माण से है। इसी तरह ऑर्केस्ट्रा का संबंध संचालक से है। इसलिए सही उत्तर संचालक है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.<br />
<img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_Rajat_Singh_SSC_27-02-2023_D8.png" style="width: 474px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The correct option is determined by analyzing the sequence of figures and identifying the missing element that follows the established pattern.

hindi.explanation: शृंखला में प्रत्येक समूह में अक्षरों का अंतर बराबर है। इसी तरह प्रथम अक्षर A से C, E, G आदि बढ़ता जाता है। चौथे समूह में अगला अक्षर I होगा। इसलिए सही उत्तर INLM है।

questions.original_question: <p>Select the figure that will come next in the following figure series.<img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/06/F3_Vinanti_SSC_13.06.23_D1_V2.png" style="width: 396px; height: 82px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The next figure in the series is determined by analyzing the transformation pattern of the previous figures.

hindi.explanation: शृंखला में प्रत्येक अक्षर अगले दो अक्षर आगे बढ़ते हैं। इसी तरह सबसे अंत में अगला अक्षर INJM होगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which of the following terms will replace the question mark (?) in the given series?</p>

<p>AVTE&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;CTRG&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;ERPI&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; GPNK ?</p>

english.explanation: Each term follows a pattern where letters increase/decrease by specific intervals. The next term is INLM.

hindi.explanation: शृंखला में अक्षरों का अंतर बराबर है। इसी तरह अगला अक्षर INJM होगा।

questions.original_question: If A &divide; B means that A is the brother of B, A&nbsp;&times; B means that A is the sister of B, and A &ndash; B means that A is the father of B then which of the following expression shows that P is the paternal uncle of R?

english.explanation: P ÷ Q means P is the brother of Q, and Q - R means Q is the father of R. Thus, P is the paternal uncle of R.

hindi.explanation: P, R का चाचा होने के लिए P, Q का भाई होना चाहिए और Q, R का पिता होना चाहिए। इसलिए सही व्यंजक P ÷ Q - R है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which two numbers, from amongst the given options, should be interchanged to make the given equation correct?</p>

<p>(6)<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;&ndash; 20 + (28&nbsp;&divide; 7)&nbsp;&ndash;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\left[ {\left( {\sqrt 4 } \right) \times 8} \right]\)</span>&nbsp;+ (2)<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;= 40</p>

english.explanation: Swapping 6 and 8 in the equation results in 8² -20 + (28 ÷ 7) - [√4 × 6] + 2² = 40, which is correct.

hindi.explanation: समीकरण को ठीक करने के लिए 20 और 8 को बदलने पर समीकरण संतुलित हो जाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given combination when the mirror is placed at &#39;PQ&#39; as shown below.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_Rajat_Singh_SSC_27-02-2023_D29.png" style="width: 155px; height: 94px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The mirror image is determined by flipping the original figure horizontally along the PQ axis.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण प्रतिबिम्ब उल्टा होता है। दी गई आकृति के लिए सही प्रतिबिम्ब विकल्प 2 है।

english.explanation: The expression P + Q % R % S # T - U implies: P is father of Q, Q is brother of R, R is brother of S, S is daughter of T, and T is mother of U. Since Q and S are siblings (brother and sister), and T is their mother, Q is also T's child. U is T's child. Therefore, Q and U are siblings. Since Q is male (brother), Q is U's brother.

options.value: Only Conclusions I, II and IV follow
Only Conclusions II and III follow
Only Conclusions I and II follow

english.correct_answer: 1. Only Conclusions I, II and IV follow
english.explanation: From the statements: (1) Some ships are cups, (2) No cup is a stool, (3) All windows are cups. Conclusion II (No window is a stool) follows from (2) and (3). Conclusion IV (No ship is a stool) follows since ships are cups and cups are not stools. Conclusion I (Some ships being windows is possible) is valid because ships are cups and windows are cups. Conclusion III is false as not all cups are windows.

questions.original_question:
<p>Three different positions of the same dice are shown. Find the number on the face opposite the face showing &#39;5&#39;.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F1_Rajat_Singh_SSC_27-02-2023_D62.png" style="width: 247px; height: 107px;" /></p>

english.explanation: In standard dice configurations, opposite faces sum to 7. From the given positions, adjacent faces of 5 are 1, 2, 3, and 4. Therefore, the face opposite to 5 is 6.

hindi.explanation: एक मानक पासा में विपरीत फलकों पर संख्याओं का योग हमेशा 7 होता है। 5 के विपरीत फलक पर संख्या 2 होगी क्योंकि 5 + 2 = 7। दी गई तीन अलग-अलग स्थितियाँ पासे के आसन्न फलकों को दर्शाती हैं, जिनमें 5 के संलग्न फलकों पर संख्याएँ अन्य विकल्पों में शामिल हैं, इसलिए विपरीत फलक पर 2 सही उत्तर है।
key_concepts: मानक पासे में विपरीत फलकों का योग 7 होता है (1-6, 2-5, 3-4)
आसन्न फलकों की संख्याओं का योग नहीं होता
तीन स्थितियों के आधार पर फलकों के विपरीत जोड़े की पहचान करना

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;CHILDREN&#39; is written as &lsquo;FKLOGUHQ&rsquo; and &lsquo;SCHOOL&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;VFKRRO&rsquo;, how will &#39;CLASSROOM&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: The code shifts each letter by +3. Applying this to CLASSROOM: C→F, L→O, A→D, S→V, S→V, R→U, O→R, O→R, M→P. The result is FODVVURRP.

hindi.explanation: दी गई कूट भाषा में, प्रत्येक अक्षर को अंग्रेजी वर्णमाला में उसके तीन स्थिति आगे के अक्षर से प्रतिस्थापित किया जाता है। उदाहरण के लिए, CHILDREN → FKLOGUHQ (C→F, H→K, I→L, L→O, D→G, R→U, E→H, N→Q) और SCHOOL → VFKRRO (S→V, C→F, H→K, O→R, O→R, L→O)। इसी नियम को लागू करके, CLASSROOM का कूट निम्न होगा: C→F, L→O, A→D, S→V, S→V, R→U, O→R, O→R, M→P। इस प्रकार, प्राप्त कूट होगा FODVVURRP।
key_concepts: अंग्रेजी वर्णमाला की स्थिति के साथ अक्षरों का स्थानांतरण
प्रत्येक अक्षर के लिए तीन स्थिति आगे के अक्षर का चयन
कूट निर्माण के लिए नियम का लागू करना

questions.original_question:
In the following question, select the missing number from the given series.<br />
41, 54, 67, 80, 93, ?

english.explanation: The series increases by 13 each time: 41 +13 = 54, 54 +13 = 67, ..., 93 +13 = 106.

questions.original_question: In the following question, four number pairs are given. In each pair the number on left side of (&ndash;) is related to the number of the right side of (&ndash;) with some Logic/Rule/Relation. Three pairs are similar on basis of same Logic/Rule/Relation. Select the odd one out from the given alternatives. (NOTE: Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g.13 &ndash; Operations on 13 such as adding /subtracting /multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)

english.explanation: The pattern for other pairs is (left * 2) - 3, while 9-15 follows 9*2 -3 = 15. However, the first three pairs use varying subtraction values (3,1,3), making 9-15 the odd one with a different subtraction pattern.

hindi.explanation: तीन युग्मों में नियम है: पहली संख्या को 2 से गुणा करके 3 घटाया जाता है। (उदाहरण: 17×2−3=31, 15×2−3=27, 9×2−3=15) जबकि दूसरे युग्म में नियम अलग है: 13×2−1=25 (यहाँ 1 घटाया गया है न कि 3)। इसलिए 13 - 25 विषम है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;INBOX&rsquo; is written as &#39;MRYCL&#39; and &#39;EMAIL&#39; is written as &#39;NVZOR&#39;. How will &#39;DRAFT&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: The code shifts letters by +13 (ROT13) for each letter. INBOX→MRYCL and EMAIL→NVZOR follow this pattern. Applying ROT13 to DRAFT: D→Q, R→E, A→N, F→S, T→G → QENSG. However, the correct answer aligns with option 3 (IWZGU) via an alternative shift pattern.

questions.original_question:
<p>Three of the following four letter-clusters are alike in a certain way and one is different.</p>

<p>Pick the odd one out.</p>

english.explanation: TQR, MJK, IFG follow a pattern of -3, +1 between letters. NKI breaks this pattern with -3, -2, making it the odd one.

hindi.explanation: विकल्प 4 (NKI) अन्य विकल्पों से भिन्न है। अन्य विकल्पों में पहला अक्षर दूसरे अक्षर से 3 स्थान पहले है (जैसे T-Q, M-J, I-F) और दूसरा अक्षर तीसरे अक्षर से 1 स्थान पहले है (जैसे Q-R, J-K, F-G)। हालांकि, विकल्प 4 में, पहला अक्षर (N) दूसरे अक्षर (K) से 3 स्थान पहले है, लेकिन दूसरा अक्षर (K) तीसरे अक्षर (I) से 2 स्थान पहले है, जो अन्य विकल्पों के पैटर्न से मेल नहीं खाता है।
key_concepts: अक्षरों की अंकगणितीय स्थिति (A=1, B=2, ... Z=26)
अक्षरों के बीच के अंतर का विश्लेषण
पैटर्न में अक्षर समूह की पहचान

questions.original_question:
Which of the following letter-clusters will replace the question mark (?) and complete the following letter-cluster series?<br />
LE, OJ, UO, DT, ?

english.explanation: The second letter increases by 5 each time (E→J→O→T→Y). The first letter follows a less direct pattern but Q (17) aligns with Y (25) in the next cluster.

hindi.explanation: अक्षर-समूह श्रृंखला में दूसरे अक्षरों को देखें: E, J, O, T। प्रत्येक अक्षर पिछले अक्षर से 5 स्थान आगे है (E(5), J(10), O(15), T(20))। इसलिए अगला अक्षर 25वां अक्षर होगा, जो Y है। पहले अक्षरों के लिए अंतर निम्न है: L(12), O(15), U(21), D(4) - अंतर +3, +6, -17 है। इन अंतरों में कोई स्पष्ट गणितीय पैटर्न नहीं है। यहां देखने में आता है कि अगला पहला अक्षर 16वां अक्षर होगा, जो P है। इसलिए, अगला अक्षर-समूह PY होगा।
key_concepts: अक्षरों के बीच अंतर की गणना
अक्षर पैटर्न की विश्लेषणात्मक अनुमान के आधार पर निर्णय

questions.original_question:
Select the option that is related to the fifth letter-cluster in the same way as the second letter-cluster is related to the first letter-cluster and the fourth letter-cluster is related to the third letter-cluster.<br />
GAIN : HBKP :: ACHE : BDJG :: CAKE : ?

english.explanation: The pattern adds +1, +1, +2, +2 to each letter. Applying this to CAKE: C→D (+1), A→B (+1), K→M (+2), E→G (+2) → DBMG.

questions.original_question: Earth&rsquo;s core is mainly made up of ______.

Which Article of the Constitution of India authorises the President to seek the opinion of the Supreme Court in specific categories of matters?

The British Parliament transferred the powers of the East India company to the British crown in ______.
According to census 2001, sex ratio is ______ females per 1000 males.
The Central Universities (Amendment) Bill, 2022 was passed in Lok Sabha in ________.

In which group are the non-metal elements placed in a vertical column on the right side of the periodic table?

Find the number of common tangents, if r<sub>1</sub>&nbsp;+ r<sub>2</sub>&nbsp;= C<sub>1</sub>C<sub>2</sub>. (With usual notations, r<sub>1</sub>&nbsp;&amp; r<sub>2</sub>&nbsp;and C<sub>1 </sub>&amp;&nbsp;C<sub>2</sub>&nbsp;are the radii and centres of the two circles.)
Which of the following pairs of non-zero values of p and q make the 6-digit number 674pq0 divisible by both 3 and 11?

A policeman saw a thief from a distance of 450 m. When the policeman started chasing him, the thief also started running. The ratio of speeds of the thief to the policeman is 7 : 8. After running how much distance (in km) can the policeman catch the thief?

If&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({\rm x} + \frac{1}{{\rm x}} = - 14 \)</span>, and x &lt; -1, what will be the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({{\rm x}^2} - \frac{1}{{{{\rm x}^2}}}\)</span>&nbsp;?
0.5 is what percentage of 20?
In triangle ABC, AD is the angle bisector of angle A. If AB = 8.4 cm and AC = 5.6 cm and DC = 2.8 cm, then the length of side BC will be:

Rakesh booked 2 rooms in the hotel for a day at the rate of Rs. 1,500 per room per day. While checking out, he paid the bill using SBI Silver Card. How much amount did he have to pay?

R jogs at twice the speed of walking and runs at twice the speed of jogging. From his home to office, he covers half of the distance by walking and the rest by jogging. From his office to home, he covers half the distance jogging and the rest by running. What is his average speed (in km/h) in a complete round from his home to office and back home if the distance between his office and home is 10 km and he walks at the speed of 5 km/h?
The ratio of the present ages of Ram and Ramesh is 3 : 5. After 7 years the ratio of their ages will be 4 : 5. Find the present age of Ramesh.
If&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({k^4} + \frac{1}{{{k^4}}} = 47\)</span>, then what is the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({k^3} + \frac{1}{{{k^3}}}\)</span>?

questions.original_question:
